summary: Cicero The Jester A Favorite Of Many Has Returned With New Powers And Enhanced Skills To Befit The Keeper And Badass Assassin We All Know He Is. Let Him Unleash his True Power
descriptionHtml:
Cicero The Jester, A Badass Assassin, A Madman, Etc So Many names for this one Skyrim classic npc we all know and love but what if he showed you a few tricks you didn't know about?


Watch him return to the big screen like never before!!

Vanilla Skyrim Cicero is very Entertaining but lacked when it came to combat this mods aims to fix that with new abilities and perks to make him the most powerful assassin Of The Dark Brotherhood he may well be the keeper but theres is more than meets the eye!
[color=#cc0000]
Warning!!!![/color][color=#cc0000] You need to have Completed [/color][color=#cc0000][size=6]Hail Sithis [/size]
[size=3]For his Abilities to Come into play[/size]
[/color]Dragonborn Required

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60914-1-1419059337.jpg[/img]
[color=#38761d][size=4]Can Summon His Favorite idol ..

[/size][/color][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60914-3-1419059337.jpg[/img][color=#38761d][size=4]
See Cicero Like Never Before!!!

[/size][/color][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60914-1-1419063358.jpg[/img][color=#38761d][size=4]
[/size][/color][color=#38761d][size=4]Make Him Apart Of The A Team 
[/size][/color][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60914-2-1419063358.jpg[/img][color=#38761d][size=4]
[/size][/color][color=#38761d][size=4]

[/size][/color][color=#1155cc][size=6]Those Good Times Way Back When
[/size][/color][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60914-3-1419063358.jpg[/img][color=#1155cc][size=6]
[/size][/color][color=#1155cc]
[size=6]Don't Miss Out![/size]

if you run into problems let me Know!
